document_data.name: Jarrlak
document_data.mainbody: A '''jarrlak''' was a type of [[demon]] found within the [[Abyss]].  Jarrlaks were known both for their intelligence and their sadism, and often toyed with their victims, trapping them in blocks of ice.  Jarrlaks often aligned themselves with various [[demon lord]]s in an effort to acquire power, but they just as often struck out on their own to attempt to establish control over areas of heavy snow and cold.
document_data.Abilities: Jarrlaks were able to both entomb their enemies in ice as well as raise solid walls of ice.
document_data.Combat: Jarrlaks attempted to handle enemies one by one, preferring ideally to freeze each one before moving on to the next.
